head.title: Megan Gerber and William R. Bachman to Wed

hedline.hl1: Megan Gerber and William R. Bachman to Wed

block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Jerome Gerber of Rye, N.Y., have announced June wedding plans for their daughter Megan Rose Gerber and William R. Bachman, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Marvin Bachman of Rockville Centre, L.I.

Miss Gerber and her fiance are 28 years old and 1984 graduates of the University of Pennsylvania. They expect to receive medical degrees from Pennsylvania State University in May. Her father is a senior partner in the marketing services firm of LifeSpan Communications Inc. in New York. Her mother, Edith Gerber, is a psychoanalyst and a staff member at the Center for Modern Psychoanalytic Studies in New York.

The prospective bridegroom's mother, Harriet M. Bachman, is a kindergarten teacher at Public School 251 in Springfield Gardens, Queens. His father is an assistant professor of accounting at the C. W. Post Campus of Long Island University in Brookville.
